name: OR_LNLG_LITHOTRIPSY_INFO
description: This table contains information about the lithotripsy procedure.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: TOTAL_STONES
columns.description: This item stores the total number of stones for the lithotripsy procedure.

columns.name: LITHO_FLUOROSCOPY_TIME
columns.description: This item stores the total fluoroscopy time for the lithotripsy procedure.

columns.name: LITHO_POSITIONING_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the time when a patient was positioned for the lithotripsy procedure.
